# Bundled Dictionary Source

Bundled files under `Sources/Migemo/Resources/dict/` are derived from `koron/cmigemo` dictionary inputs:

- `migemo-dict` was generated by converting `dict/base-dict` from EUC-JP to UTF-8.
- `roma2hira.dat`, `hira2kata.dat`, `han2zen.dat`, `zen2han.dat` were converted from CP932 to UTF-8.

Example conversion commands:

```sh
iconv -f euc-jp -t utf-8 dict/base-dict > migemo-dict
iconv -f cp932 -t utf-8 dict/roma2hira.dat > roma2hira.dat
iconv -f cp932 -t utf-8 dict/hira2kata.dat > hira2kata.dat
iconv -f cp932 -t utf-8 dict/han2zen.dat > han2zen.dat
iconv -f cp932 -t utf-8 dict/zen2han.dat > zen2han.dat
```

Licensing note:
- `migemo-dict` is derived from `SKK-JISYO.L`.
- `SKK-JISYO.L` declares GPL-2.0-or-later in its header.
- See `Vendor/skk/SKK-JISYO.L.HEADER.txt` and `Vendor/skk/COPYING`.
